name: NEPH_TREATMENT_DAYS
description: The NEPH_TREATMENT_DAYS table stores the patient's preferred days for their home dialysis treatment.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NEPH_TREATMENT_DAYS_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's preferred days for home dialysis treatment.
